original_title: Dengue control programs to commence on Thursday
original_body_lines: COLOMBO(News 1st): The National Dengue Control Unit of the Ministry of Health says that the Dengue control programs will commence island-wide from Thursday(13).
Its Director Dr. Nalin Ariyaratne says that the program will be in place on Thursday, Friday, and Saturday.
He also added that the support of the tri-forces has been obtained.
So far 51,477 dengue patients have been reported in the island.
Director of the National Dengue Control Unit Dr. Nalin Ariyaratne says that 50% of the cases are reported from the Western province.
